info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 5:44PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of central Warren, north central Saratoga and central Washington Counties through 615 PM EST... At 543 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds 8 miles west of Warrensburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Warrensburg, Whitehall, Lake George Village, Granville, Johnsburg, Hartford, Comstock, Bolton Landing, Lake Luzerne Campground, Chestertown, Glens Falls North, Huletts Landing, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, Lake Luzerne, Bolton, Hadley and Thurman. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 19 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
